column10: Default Emission Coefficient from Aardenne 1990 (Global Emission)

column5: Emission Factor for US derived from US EPA emission with MiniCAM

column4: Default gamma is 1;  this one is set to .5 instead to scale
back industrial CO emissions over time

column3: CONVERGENCE TABLE --  this makes the emissions coefficient converge for all regions to specified value
Enter the desired coefficient (check OG_COEFFS.CSV for the implied coefficients if base year emissions are entered), -1 turns off convergence for that cell

column1: Correction of mis-matched input data for a few regions -- resulting in huge emissions factors where there are small emissions
